Leah, but The Tourist star's rep insists Angelina Jolie has only been meeting with officials and lawyers in the country to set up her own charitable foundation for the impoverished nation's children. The spokesperson says, There is no truth to these rumours. Angelina Jolie is focused on enhancing the welfare and legal protection of children within Haiti. As such, she has been meeting with government of Haiti officials, Haitian legal experts and non-governmental organizations regarding a new initiative of the Brad Pitt Foundation. The recently launched Angelina Jolie Legal Fellows Program will assist the justice system in Haiti to improve child protection.

Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
